summary: Based on the true story of four friends who decide to install a communal pirate radio station called Rádio Favela in a shanty-town, to give voice to the outcasts' complaints.
cast: Alexandre Moreno|Babu Santana|Adolfo Moura|Benjamim Abras|Tião D'Ávila|Edyr de Castro|Priscila Dias|Renata Otto|Hamilton Borges Walê
title: Radio Favela
